label: Marking
comment: An inscription, stamp or label such as to indicate date, ownership, quality, manufacture or origin.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying an automatic data capture method type for this packaging marking.
Content, expressed as text, of this packaging marking.
Content, expressed as a monetary amount, for this packaging marking.
Content, expressed as a code, of this packaging marking.
The date, time, date time or other date time value for the content of this packaging marking.
A code specifying a type of barcode for this packaging marking.
A code specifying a type of packaging marking.

referencedBy.comment: A marking specified for this supply chain packaging, such as an inscription, stamp or label to indicate date, ownership, quality, manufacture or origin.
